description: Large frameless goggles that don’t get in between you and the perfect line. The Nevada Mag’s frameless design mounts its large cylindrical lens right on the frame, providing you with a huge field of view and crisp details from edge-to-edge.Fits medium to large faces best.One style is equipped Bolle’s Phantom+ NXT lens, this material lighter and clearer than polycarbonate.Bolle’s photochromic lenses change with the changing light conditions, one lens takes you from overcast to bright sun, shifting from a category 1 to a category 3 lens in less than 30 seconds.Phantom+ lenses are lightly polarized, balancing reduced reflection with the edge detail needed when looking at snow and ice.Matte Black Cubes colourway included lenses: Phantom+ (51%–15% VLT) and Light Vermillion Blue (51% VLT).Black Mountain colourway included lenses: Black Chrome (15% VLT) and Light Vermillion (51% VLT).Additional lenses included to customize your outlook with the changing weather.Magnetic lens alignment makes lens changes easy, and the EyeLatch system locks the lens in place.Flow Tech® lens ventilation system combats fogging.Double-layered thermal lenses have anti-fog and anti-scratch protection.Triple-layer face foam provides a comfortable seal.Strap has silicone strips to keep it in place.
name: Bolle Nevada Mag Goggles - Unisex
